description:
When out for a ride, you should think about shifting as much as you think about peddling, barely at all. With its smooth crisp shifts, the Advent X trail shifter keeps shifts effortless, so you can think about the important things, like dodging trees.

  • Ergonomic paddles are easy use even when hammering through tech
  • Lever bearing keeps shifts smooth
  • Works with microSHIFT Advent X rear derailleur. Not compatible with Shimano or SRAM
name: Microshift Advent X Trail Trigger Shifter 1X10
